1.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: I’m going to help you if you help me.
respuestas.b: I’ll help you if you help me.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

2.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Why are you here? - I’m going to help your sister with her homework.
respuestas.b: Why are you here? - I’ll help your sister with her homework.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

3.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: If she doesn’t start working harder, she’s going to fail the test.
respuestas.b: If she doesn’t start working harder, she’ll fail the test.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

4.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: There’s a knock at the door. - I’m going to go!
respuestas.b: There’s a knock at the door. - I’ll go!
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

5.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Let’s ask John how to solve this problem. He’s going to know.
respuestas.b: Let’s ask John how to solve this problem. He’ll know.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

respuestas.a: are going to
respuestas.b: is going to
respuestas.c: is will

7.pregunta: Michael and Laura ___________ go on a trip to Egypt next week

respuestas.a: are gonna
respuestas.b: is gonna
respuestas.c: is going

8.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: I’m not ready yet. - That’s ok, I’m going to wait.
respuestas.b: I’m not ready yet. - That’s ok, I’ll wait.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

respuestas.a: Will
respuestas.b: Won't
respuestas.c: Going to

10.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Are you going to play basketball after school today? - No, I have too much work.
respuestas.b: Will you play basketball after school today? - No, I have too much work.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

respuestas.a: If you don’t hurry up, we’re going to be late.
respuestas.b: If you don’t hurry up, we’ll be late.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

respuestas.b: To make a promise

13.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Do you have any plans for the future? - Yes, I’m going to work on a farm.
respuestas.b: Do you have any plans for the future? - Yes, I’ll work on a farm.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

14.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Do you know how to make a PowerPoint presentation? - Yes. I’m going to show you.
respuestas.b: Do you know how to make a PowerPoint presentation? - Yes. I’ll show you.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

15.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Do you know how to make a PowerPoint presentation? - Yes. I’m going to show you.
respuestas.b: Let’s have a party. - Great idea. I’ll buy the drink. You get the food.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

16.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Sorry. We have no more French Fries. - Ok, I’m going to have rice instead.
respuestas.b: Sorry. We have no more French Fries. - Ok, I’ll have rice instead.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

17.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: Look at the dark clouds. I think it’s going to rain.
respuestas.b: Look at the dark clouds. I think it will rain.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

18.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: John phoned. - I know. I’m going to call him back after dinner.
respuestas.b: John phoned. - I know. I’ll call him back after dinner.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

19.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: John phoned. - Really? I’m going to call him back after dinner.
respuestas.b: John phoned. - Really? I’ll call him back after dinner.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.

20.pregunta: Look at the pairs of sentences on the right

respuestas.a: He’s going to have a bad accident if he continues to drive so fast.
respuestas.b: He’ll have a bad accident if he continues to drive so fast.
respuestas.c: Both of the above sentences are correct.
